body.name: Graco Paris 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (Black) – GREENGUARD Gold Certified, Converts to Toddler Bed, Daybed and Full-Size Bed, Fits Standard Full-Size Crib Mattress, Adjustable Mattress Support Base
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 17 mins
features: 4-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from baby crib (mattress sold separately) to toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed with headboard & optional footboard (conversion kit sold separately); Assembly required

ADAPTS TO YOUR GROWING BABY: Adjustable mattress support base with 3 different height options; Designed to fit any standard full-size crib & toddler mattress; This baby crib may be used until your child can easily climb out or is taller than 35in (89cm)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED, JPMA CERTIFIED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air; Expert tested to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards
QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with pine wood, engineered wood, and wood composites; Packaging tested to reduce the risk of incidental damage that could occur during shipment

AWARD-WINNING BRAND: Exclusively from Graco, proud recipient of the 2022 Women’s Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture and Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval for nursery and children’s furniture
body.description: The Graco Paris 4-in-1 Convertible Crib offers parents classic elegance, showcased by a grand, scaled headboard with sweet details - all at an exceptional value. With its traditional, timeless, and elegant design, the Graco Paris is the perfect choice to get your nursery started. The Graco Paris is constructed with pine wood and composites, durably constructed last throughout babyhood, toddlerhood, and childhood. Designed to adapt to your growing child from the baby stage throughout childhood, the Graco Paris 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has an adjustable mattress support base with 3 different height options. Also, the Paris easily converts from a capable full-size baby crib to a toddler bed (compatible with Graco Toddler Guardrail) and daybed. For a safer sleep, the Graco Paris is JPMA Certified, and expert-tested to meet all applicable federal safety standards. Rest easy knowing that the Graco Paris is backed by a 1-year limited warranty, and supportive customer care. Graco Toddler Safety Guardrail and Graco Full-Size Crib Conversion Kit each sold separately. Exclusively from Graco, 2021 Women's Choice Award Winner for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture. Assembled Width (54.33 in from side to side) x Assembled Depth (29.45 in from front to back) x Assembled Height (43.07 in from top of headboard to floor). Maximum child height for crib stage: 35 in (88.9 cm). Maximum child weight for daybed and toddler stage: 50 pounds (22.68 kg).

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very cute crib.. Google quality. It has a small side where the paint is not even, but not a big deal...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When taking the parts of the crib from the box, we noticed the top part that goes to the back of the crib (what would be the headboard) a piece was broken off!! We searched all the packaging and the area in the bedroom to find the broken piece (thinking maybe it got broken in shipping and we could maybe fix it)...it wasn't there!This was clearly a defective piece of product intentionally placed when being packaged, before being sold and shipped! The crib itself is beautiful and sturdy, just this broken part is why I'm giving 3 stars. When the baby is old enough to stand we will have to somehow fix it so she doesn't get cut or get splinters. Smh we expected better from a Graco product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The baby crib arrived with obvious damage to the carton & contents! Also, the carton was quite dirty & appeared to have been stored for a long period of time!
